Uses of Interface
org.ejbca.core.model.services.IWorker

  • Packages that use IWorker 
    Package Description
    org.ejbca.core.ejb.services  
    org.ejbca.core.model.services  
    org.ejbca.core.model.services.workers  

    • Uses of IWorker in org.ejbca.core.ejb.services

      Methods in org.ejbca.core.ejb.services that return IWorker 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      IWorker ServiceSessionLocal.getWorkerIfItShouldRun​(Integer serviceId, long nextTimeout)
      Reads the current timeStamp values and tries to update them in a single transaction.
      IWorker ServiceSessionLocal.getWorkerIfItShouldRun​(Integer serviceId, long nextTimeout, boolean testRunOnOtherNode)
      As above but used to JUnit testing to be able to "fake" that the service was running on another node Should only be used for testing the logic
      Methods in org.ejbca.core.ejb.services with parameters of type IWorker 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ServiceSessionLocal.executeServiceInNoTransaction​(IWorker worker, String serviceName)
      Executes a the service in a separate in no transaction.

    • Uses of IWorker in org.ejbca.core.model.services

      Classes in org.ejbca.core.model.services that implement IWorker 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BaseWorker
      Abstract base class that initializes the worker and its interval and action.

    • Uses of IWorker in org.ejbca.core.model.services.workers

      Classes in org.ejbca.core.model.services.workers that implement IWorker 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CertificateExpirationNotifierWorker
      Makes queries about which certificates that is about to expire in a given number of days and creates a notification sent to either the end user or the administrator.
      class  CRLDownloadWorker
      Worker used for downloading external CRLs and populating the local database with limited CertificateData entries, that can be used to service OCSP responses and stores the CRL locally, so it could be served for example through the public web.
      class  CRLUpdateWorker
      Class managing the updating of CRLs.
      class  EmailSendingWorker  
      class  HsmKeepAliveWorker
      Worker that keeps HSM sessions active.
      class  PublishQueueProcessWorker
      Class processing the publisher queue.
      class  RenewCAWorker
      Worker renewing CA that is about to expire.
      class  RolloverWorker
      Replaces CA certificate chains with a pending new rollover certificate chain once the new certificate chain becomes valid.
      class  UserPasswordExpireWorker
      Worker expiring users password after a configured amount of time.
